title: Outcome-Based Project-Based Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and core competencies in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Project-based learning conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Learner groups consist of professionals focused on solving real workplace problems.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate achievement by completing math projects based on real-world work scenarios with over 80% completion accuracy.
Learners can evaluate peers' project outcomes with over 75% accuracy and provide constructive feedback through peer review.
Learners can demonstrate practical problem-solving skills by achieving over 85 points in the comprehensive final assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
